locations.title: Love's Travel Stop
locations.content: Love's Travel Stop may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ This place also smells bad, trash everywhere, and just not the cleanest. We definitely decided against a shower. Wasn‚Äôt even going to try it. ‚Ä¶

My husband just tried to get a shower but for some reason when the manager scanned his loves reward card it wasn't showing up even though he has 2 shower credits. He showed the manager (Stacy) his credits via the app. She asked if he hadn't ‚Ä¶
Good amount of truck parking. Smaller, older style Love‚Äôs, but well kept. Showers have a fairly recent remodel. Although small as well they are fairly well maintained. Pictures from shower #2.

Got a shower after a long day on the road and first the associate was alittle off putting like she was being annoyed by doing her job. Everything was disgusting. Shower was disgusting. Toilet was disgusting. There was pimple strings on the ‚Ä¶
Dirty shower .. they not clean up after shower.. they just changed the towels . That's all clean up... finding some stuff from previous.. and a lot of hair on the floor

Good experience here. Good Big Rig parking (medium lot, easy to park though, overflow lot to the east, a bit to walk to Loves but it's available), good shower, has Subway and Chester's. Want to say Thanks to the male employee at Chester's: ‚Ä¶

Place is absolutely garbage employees are rude and lazy stand around talking instead of doing their job Dont even try taking a shower at this facility unless you have a day to waste because they won‚Äôt clean them for hours

Shower didn‚Äôt have any water pressure at all and hardly any hot water then went to wash my clothes and it showed you can use your loves points but the machine won‚Äôt accept the loves car and when I asked the girl about it I was basically ‚Ä¶
I never recommended shower to everyone bcoz he didn‚Äôt clean it be careful everyone

‚Ä¶ touch them if her life depended on it. Wouldn't even bag a coat because it was a kids' coat. When I asked about showers, she said that that was not her job. There were 4 showers empty and not clean, but I still had to wait for my shower.

locations.title: ONE9 Travel Center
locations.content: ONE9 Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: New clean truck stop,  with very friendly stuff members. They have big clean showers,  but only one thing I don't like... water in the shower warm bot hot and this is huge disadvantage for me

spent the night here for the first time! The workers are very slow and do not want to work! reserved a shower and waited 50 minutes, although there was no one in front of me! the shower is very dirty! truck stop looks almost new! no waiting ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ Three out of four showers are dirty. A lot of people are waiting, and I‚Äôve been first in line for 40 minutes. Nobody is cleaning them! I asked the cashier to clean the showers, and she just said, ‚ÄúDon‚Äôt be crazy.‚Äù ‚Ä¶

One of the nicer newer One9's you'll ever come across. Also their showers are nice. Toilet is fat man friendly, and the showers are huge. So huge they have two shower heads and a shower bench. Water pressure awesome. Thanks to Trumps ‚Ä¶
Over 1 hr waiting for my shower, and problem is the people of truck stop don‚Äôt clean the showers
reserved a shower and ‚Ä¶
Hire more people to clean the shower wait one hour i‚Äôm the first one in line. The store is clean. Looks brand new.

They don't clean the showers on time, I waited an hour, came up and said that shower 4 was already open and needed to be cleaned, to which they told me "it's always open", if you want to go to the shower here you'll waste a lot of time
‚Ä¶ -Shower number 2 has no cold water in the sink. So if you like to brush your teeth with hot water, you‚Äôll be happy. ‚Ä¶
Great place, very clean shower and do not have to wait, not to many dirty drivers getting here & hopefully it keeps like that, great staff

locations.title: Chester's
locations.content: Chester's may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Long wait on a shower, although 5 showers were free with doors open. The store was not busy what so ever. Don't understand why it took over an hour to decide to go and clean the showers while there are drivers in line.

‚Ä¶ the store on the truck side was broken but was being fixed. I took a shower, and the security lock caught on the edge of the door very loudly where it's broken. The toilet wasn't cleaned, even though the showers are supposed to be cleaned ‚Ä¶
Clean hot shower, what else could I ask for .lot or parking by 9:00pm it was a good day
Its dirty and long lines was going to get shower and food but not worth the wait
Fuel, parking,food and shower.

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ service exceeded my expectations. Lory was helpful & friendly. The shower was worth every penny with towels, soap, sink & toilet. The transit center, the parking lot and the shower room were clean and well lit. I felt safe & I ‚Ä¶

If you're in a hurry, never ever take a shower here. I'm sorry, but for \$17, it's just a disgrace. I'm a girl, and it took me 30 minutes to rinse my hair from the shampoo because the water pressure was so weak. And when I finally did it ‚Ä¶

I had always taken showers at Flying J and Loves until today. Now am using TA to fuel and I came to take a shower and I loved it here. The shower room it‚Äôs clean and renovated. I loved it way more than loves and flying J . It‚Äôs very quiet, ‚Ä¶

Reserved parking. When I got there went in for a shower and a meal......all that fuel I got all year ....points disappeared showers disappeared. Had to pay for a shower. It stunk the toilet seat was speckled from someone else , there was a ‚Ä¶
I'm here everyday. I mean, all I wanted is a shower and laundry today, that's all. The sink wasn't even touched. Customer service is overdue

Drove all day and wanted to stop and get a shower and get some sleep.  After reserving shower with 0 wait on app, walk in store to take a shower.  Wait 5 min and now shower number was given.  Husband walked around shower hall and one showed ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ a rest after many hours of driving and the other truck stops were so loud and overcrowded, decided to actually take a shower here, showers were fine but wear sandals or socks ,place just needs a remodel, nice lady at the counter working the ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText: Does this shower maintenance/ custodian deserve a tip? Are these cleanest showers on road like this company's slogan reads? Shower 8 10:05 local time. If you were really cleaning the shower with a mop, you would have seen that and you would ‚Ä¶

If you are waiting for a shower for a long time at 11 pm. And you went to check if there is a person who cleans the showers. He sits in the staff room, slowly folding towels. And when he sees you, he asks: "Can I help you with something?" Y ‚Ä¶
Very large wide creative parking lot. Partially paved. Reserved parking is not enforced here. No beer! üç∫ Shower is good enough. ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ would have gone down the road to the TA. My company only gets fuel from pilot flying j so I figured I would stay here since I was going to be parked till Monday and I could get a free shower. When I got here I went in looked around and ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ ! Everywhere trash! The toilets are not cleaned, it is impossible to take a shower, first you wash yourself in cold water, and then you are abruptly doused with hot water which can be scalded in 3 seconds! Company management pay attention ‚Ä¶
DO NOT SHOWER HERE! Do not clean their bathrooms or showers. Shower attendant is horrible, offered customers dirty showers and obviously didn't clean anything anyway.
terrible shower!!!! I burned myself several times because he poured hot water on me!!! Fix it already!!! This is not normal!!!

This place is terrible. I could get a free shower here with diesel purchase, it's not worth it.  This morning at  7:45 zero hot food. This place fails at a lot of the reasons why I stop at a truck stop. The men's room had zero soap in the ‚Ä¶

Just stopped here for the night.  Was told by an employee named Joshua that I was unable to shower and that he wasn't running the showers tonight cause he is the only employee there, although his manager is also there but keeps complaining ‚Ä¶

Dirty bathrooms. Falling apart, Showers are cold AF. When you drive all day and need a hot shower to break the aches in your muscles and bones. If I wanted a cold shower I would of jumped in the north platte. What they need to do is tear ‚Ä¶
